text: The women's 'Soft Styles with Weapons' category involved eight contestants from five countries across two continents - Europe and North America. Each contestant went through seven performances (2 minutes each) with the totals added up at the end of the event. The gold medal winner was Ekaterina Chizhikova from Russia with compatriot Elena Chirkova gaining silver. Veronika Dombrovskaya from Belarus claimed the bronze medal spot. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Position ! Contestant ! 1 ! 2 ! 3 ! 4 ! 5 ! 6 ! 7 !
